700300.name: When It Hits the Fan - Original Soundtrack
700300.description:
This DLC includes the entire Original Soundtack featuring every song from the game in both 320kbps MP3 and ogg formats.! Featuring the musician ryunocore who has worked on other game and anime titles. The tracklist is as follows:

  • When It Hits the Fan Main Theme
  • City Zone
  • Stage Fanfare
  • Bonus Stage
  • Laboratory Zone
  • Boss Theme
  • Boss Fanfare
  • Hell Zone
  • Alien Mothership
  • Final Boss Theme
  • Final Boss Fanfare
  • Credits

NOTE: The soundtrack will install itself into your When It Hits the Fan game directory, usually in Steam/steamapps/common/When It Hits the Fan/When It Hits the Fan OST/ for the mp3 version and /When It Hits the Fan/ogg.zip for the ogg version. This DLC contains no playable content and only includes the soundtrack.
